title: Enhancing Customer Service Practical Competencies: Online Pre-Learning Tutorials for Strengthening Basic Science Knowledge

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain core concepts in basic biology, chemistry, and physiology with 90% accuracy.
Learners can self-directly plan and execute a study schedule using online tutorials, achieving a completion rate of over 80%.
Learners can analyze the correlation between foundational science knowledge assessments and final grades to adjust learning strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
